decision_conditions: The cleaning of the building, in accordance with the method hereby approved and the installation of the replacement shopfront hereby approved shall be completed within six months from the date of this consent.  Evidence of the completion of the works shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority within one month of the completion of the work.
In order to preserve the architectural and historical interest of the heritage asset.

The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out otherwise than in complete accordance with the approved plans (as set out on page one of this decision notice), the sample of materials submitted and the associated heritage statement.
For the avoidance of doubt and to ensure that the development is carried out as approved.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: In accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework, improvements required to make the proposal acceptable were negotiated with agent of the applicant with respect to material, The amendments were subsequently submitted in March 2025.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
L0008.19 (approved 17.06.20) granted listed building consent for the following works: ‘The Conversion of the barn dwelling to an office space, plus some internal additional essential upgrades to the properties facing North Street in 215-217, such as fire stopping, alarms etc. as well as retention of a new shop front to 217.’  

This current application is identical to the works approved in application L0008.19
